Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Reroute at Pulaski/26th
ShortDescription: 60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted via 26th, Kedzie, Cermak, Kostner and 26th, due to street blockage near Pulaski/26th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 26th, Kedzie, Cermak, Kostner and 26th, due to street blockage near Pulaski/26th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Reroute near Pulaski/26th.
ShortDescription: 53 Pulaski buses temp. rerouted NB: 31st, Central Park, Cermak & Pulaski; SB: Pulaski, Cermak, Lawndale, 31st and into the Terminal.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Pulaski/26th, due to street blockage.

Northbound buses will operate via 31st, Central Park, Cermak and Pulaski.

Southbound buses will operate via Pulaski, Cermak, Lawndale, 31st and into the Terminal.

Allow extra travel time.
